leadingOnBoardUnitId.description: see NID_ENGINE. To be usable with ETCS must contain a decimal number [0..16.777.215]

issuedAt.description: issue-point in time with microsecond-precision builds a version-id for acknowledgements and validity-estimations, in UTC

nidDRTA.description: defines national identifier for the Digital Register Transactor

nidC.description: defines country identifier for the Digital Register Transactor

timeOutResponse.description: defines the maximum time after which repository should consider that the request has not been answered

systemVersion.description: defines the system version to be used for DR Transactor
